verses.name: Acts 22:25
verses.text: And as they bound him with thongs, Paul said unto the centurion that stood by, Is it lawful for you to scourge a man that is a Roman, and uncondemned?

verses.name: Acts 22:26
verses.text: When the centurion heard that, he went and told the chief captain, saying, Take heed what thou doest: for this man is a Roman.

verses.name: Acts 22:27
verses.text: Then the chief captain came, and said unto him, Tell me, art thou a Roman? He said, Yea.

verses.name: Acts 22:28
verses.text: And the chief captain answered, With a great sum obtained I this freedom. And Paul said, But I was free born.
